<!-- Code generated from the comments of the CommConfig struct in builder/hyperv/common/comm_config.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

- `-` (psrp.Config) - PSRP communicator configuration (internal use)

- `psrp_host` (string) - --- PSRP Connection Settings ---
  The hostname or IP address of the remote host for PSRP connection.
  Only used with wsman transport; for hvsock, this is ignored.

- `psrp_port` (int) - The port to connect to. Defaults to 5985 (HTTP) or 5986 (HTTPS).

- `psrp_username` (string) - The username for PSRP authentication.

- `psrp_password` (string) - The password for PSRP authentication.

- `psrp_timeout` (string) - Connection timeout. Defaults to "5m".

- `psrp_transport` (string) - --- PSRP Transport Settings ---
  Transport type: "wsman" (HTTP/HTTPS) or "hvsock" (PowerShell Direct).
  Defaults to "wsman".

- `psrp_vmid` (string) - The Hyper-V Virtual Machine GUID for hvsock transport. If not specified,
  it will be auto-detected from the VM being built.

- `psrp_configuration_name` (string) - PowerShell configuration name for hvsock. Defaults to "Microsoft.PowerShell".

- `psrp_use_tls` (bool) - --- PSRP TLS Settings ---
  Use TLS (HTTPS) for the connection. Defaults to false.

- `psrp_insecure` (bool) - Skip TLS certificate verification. Defaults to false.

- `psrp_auth_type` (string) - --- PSRP Authentication Settings ---
  Authentication type: "basic", "ntlm", "kerberos", or "negotiate".
  Defaults to "negotiate".

- `psrp_domain` (string) - Domain for NTLM/Negotiate authentication.

- `psrp_realm` (string) - Kerberos realm. Optional on Windows (uses SSPI).

<!-- End of code generated from the comments of the CommConfig struct in builder/hyperv/common/comm_config.go; -->
